attributes.additional_details: Lets not cut police budgets I feel they do a great job and they should be rewarded as such. I feel their pay should at least go up in line with inflation. I want to see them on my streets and roads patrolling and also less behind the desk. Please sign this petition so that scenes that have occurred all over the UK do not happen again and the Police have the high morale to deal with hooligans and thugs ... and they know that the public know we are behind them 100%
